GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article using a given article id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments from a specific article with a given article id

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves a newly created comment object for an article using a given article id

comment.body: Yay, this is the latest comment.

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a newly updated article object using a given article id

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: serves the deleted comment object that has the given comment_id

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles?topic=cats.description: serves a list of articles that have a topic value of cats
